name: Federal Signal Corporation
description: Federal Signal Corporation is a leading provider of environmental and safety solutions, specializing in the manufacture of communication and signaling products, as well as emergency response systems. Founded in 1901, the company has built a reputation for delivering high-quality and reliable products that enhance public safety and improve environmental conditions in communities. Federal Signal operates through two primary segments: Safety and Security Systems, which includes products such as outdoor warning sirens, emergency response equipment, and traffic control devices; and Environmental Solutions, which offers street cleaning and vacuum equipment, as well as waste management solutions. The company is committed to innovation and continuously invests in research and development to provide state-of-the-art technologies that meet the evolving needs of its customers. Federal Signal serves a diverse range of markets, including government, transportation, and industrial sectors, and has a significant presence in North America and international markets. With a strong focus on corporate responsibility, Federal Signal aims to create safer environments while promoting sustainability and reducing environmental impact through its product offerings and operations.
